alert.note: Alert for Baca; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 3:58PM MDT until July 02 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN PROWERS AND NORTHEASTERN BACA COUNTIES... At 358 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Two Buttes, or 15 miles northwest of The Saunders Elevator, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Prowers and northeastern Baca Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
